preqs: Must have passed 96 credit points towards the BFA Art History and Curating

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {F20033%}

description: Students enrolled in this unit will complete a six-week internship with an external organisation, such as a gallery or museum, for a minimum of one day per week. The internship is self-managed, with the assistance of the Unit Coordinator and host organisation. The internship experience will enable students to put their skills and knowledge into practice in a professional workplace, and build industry contacts and confidence. Students will complete a journal that documents and reflects on the internship experience.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
